content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI previously executed "execute_shell" with the argument "ping -c 3 google.com" and installed iputils-ping successfully. I received a successful STDOUT message and an error message related to debconf. Recently, I attempted to clone a repository using the command "clone_repository" with the URL "https://github.com/exampleuser/example-repository.git" and the clone path "/home/user/example-repository". However, the command returned an error due to the repository not being found.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "None"}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://github.com/exampleuser/example-repository.git", "question": "Can we access this repository?"}}}'}]
"""
